channel.title: playerEquipment[playerHat]=id, amount
channel.description:
hello my current code is this but when i log in it shows i have the item on but shows 0 until i reequip it character
exaple: character-equip = 2 1191 0 character-equip = 3 1323 1
player.java playerEquipment[playerHat]=1191; i tried playerEquipment[playerHat]=1191,1; whats the correct way?
